text: Welcome to the complete AudioPipeline demonstration! This showcases text-to-speech with ambient background audio.
The system processes JSON input files containing text prompts and generates professional audio with background ambiance.
Each audio file features a randomly selected background track from our collection of ambient sounds.
The background audio is automatically balanced to enhance the listening experience without overwhelming the speech.
This technology is perfect for creating engaging content, podcasts, audiobooks, and multimedia presentations.
